reviewText: I just watched this film and found it to be very good and, for sure, worth watching.The interviewer does a very good job interviewing professors and university students with polite but pointed questions to show that there really is no observable evidence to support the claims of evolution.  Even the professors are not able to provide observable evidence that one kind of organism can evolve into a different kind of organism, as an example, a dinosaur into a bird.  One has to conclude after watching the many interviews that the interviewees really do not have any scientific evidence but really only have a belief system.Also, the movie reveals the stark reality of evolution that it leads to a devaluing of life, particularly human life.  The viewer will be amazed and alarmed, I hope, at the answer to the question posed to many of the participants, "If you were given a choice of saving your drowning dog or cat or a neighbour, which would you save first?"  When you see the quote of leading evolutionist Richard Dawkins, it will show you why so many justify abortion on the basis of evolution.The film is packed with a great deal of insight.  It is well worth getting.
summary: Evolution Exposed as an Atheistic Belief System and Not Science

reviewText: Lies and propaganda.Comfort, who can't even define evolution, tries to debunk what he refuses to understand. It's reminiscent of a caveman throwing rocks at the moon because it scares him. Every claim ray makes has been thoroughly refuted and documented.If you think you will find truth in this "documentary", you won't.

reviewText: I am so critical when it comes to Christian documentaries and movies because I don't like to recommend something that is not Godly.This documentary is excellent! I HIGHLY recommend to believers and non believers.Ray interviews several university students and professors about evolution, and to me the outcome was shocking. How many people have never heard about Jesus, in the US alone!

reviewText: I applaud Ray Comfort for making this movie available online at no charge. Anyone who wishes to see whether or not Ray Comfort's religious beliefs have a scientific basis or whether they are tired and regurgitated can now do so without expending a single penny.Ray Comfort isn't a scientist. He's nothing more than a fraud and a charlatan who has been repeating the same tired lines on his blog and FaceBook page for several years.Comfort and their cronies have already come to the table with their conclusion: Intelligent Design is a fact. The conclusions we get are speculations and incredulous claims along the lines of "Wow! I can't see how this occurred naturally!" "The eye is perfectly designed for seeing!" "The lion was clearly designed by a benevolent creator to catch its prey swiftly, mercifully bringing its life to an end in a split-second." This last comment ignores how the conflicting "design" of how antelopes and buffaloes were created to ESCAPE from said predators. Their attempts to discredit evolution account to little more than an inability to study and learn what evolution actually is.
Title: N/A
